content.rendered:
A favourite for a reason, our phalaenopsis orchid plants are the ideal gift for those with classic tastes. 

Renowned for their resilience and longevity, phalaenopsis orchids thrive in indoor environments, making them perfect additions to home decor or office settings. Positioned in spaces such as reception areas, conference rooms, or executive offices instantly enhances the ambiance, creating a welcoming atmosphere.

Phalaenopsis orchid plant are carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a neutral toned, low-set ceramic planter, finished with moss and trailing ribbon.

Our range of phalaenopsis orchids are sourced locally from our premium plant nurseries.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The orchid plant you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest phalaenopsis orchid to convey your sentiments.

Small vase size: 11cm H x 24cm W approx.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
